title: Stress, health and you (TEFC)
creator_credit: Neil Mawby Productions and Herbert Long
brief_description: Deals with stress and its effect on our health. Dr. Selye discusses how stress can have both positive and negative causes. An overview that helps people to analyse how their own health is modified by stressful events.
